document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 99-05
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON LIMITING THE CITY'S PROVISION OF NEW WATER AND SEWER CONNECTIONS AND SERVICES TO RESIDENCES AND BUSINESSES CURRENTLY WITHIN THE CORPORATE LIMITS OF THE CITY AND UNDER CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES THE CITY URBAN LIMIT LINE AND THE CITY WATER SERVICE AREA
